thread.title: Chelsea v Swansea: Watch Stamford Bridge fans pay tribute to Frank Lampard | London Evening Standard
thread.title_full: Chelsea v Swansea: Watch Stamford Bridge fans pay tribute to Frank Lampard | London Evening Standard

author: Vaishali Bhardwaj
title: Chelsea v Swansea: Watch Stamford Bridge fans pay tribute to Frank Lampard | London Evening Standard

organizations.name: frank lampard | london evening standard  chelsea

text:
Chelsea fans paid tribute to Frank Lampard as the club legend was paraded at Stamford Bridge during half-time of Saturday's 3-1 Premier League win against Swansea . 
Lampard, who sits at the top of Chelsea's all-time goalscorer list with 211 strikes, was applauded by supporters as the club's special half-time guest during the league clash. 
His appearance appeared to be a god omen with the scores level at 1-1, as Chelsea went on to move 11 points clear at the top of the table with a hard-fought win over the Swans. 
Cesc Fabregas scored on his 300th Premier League appearance, but Fernando Llorente equalised on the stroke of half-time. (AFP/Getty Images) 
Pedro scored Chelsea's second when his shot deceived Swansea's goalkeeper Lukasz Fabianski, and Diego Costa added a late third as Antonio Conte's men won a 12th successive home game. 
With Manchester City not in action this weekend and Liverpool at Leicester on Monday, the Blues' advantage increased with 12 games to go. In Pictures | Chelsea vs Swansea | 25/02/2017 In Pictures | Chelsea vs Swansea | 25/02/2017 1/32
